comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
We'll probably want to update the message:

> If you continue, all children will be removed with the item. Are you sure you want to continue?

Which appears when deleting a link to a folder. If you _do_ continue, it makes you use `-Force` and then deletes just the link, and those does _not_ recurse. This is a usability issue, I'll file a new bug.
